basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Ella Rekow. I am a Junior in Software Engineering studying at Iowa State, as well as continuing an internship doing front end development for Netsmart. I do art, climb, game development and more in my freetime along with promoting kindness in the tech community though my TikTok platform. I also love learning new things in the tech world!

projects.title: Women In Science and Engineering Community Leader
projects.description: Similar to a learning community, I continue to run a small group of Women who are persuing degrees in Tech. We meet on a weekly basis and participate in various activities from just hanging out and chatting to talking to guest speakers who are working in the field, resume reviews, and more! The focus is creating a community of girls who can help eachother and build their skills and have a strong support system.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
